bug.short_desc: Could not build without clearing the cache

long_desc.thetext:
We are not able to build our project ("source") without cleaning the cache every time.
The generator says the following:
[exec] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- [exec] Initializing: conf [exec] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- [exec] >>> Processing configuration [exec] [exec] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- [exec] Executing: source::source-script [exec] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- [exec] >>> Scanning libraries / [exec] 'str' object has no attribute 'name'

Force re-scanning of a lib when the cache file could not be evaluated.
master: faacf0dc4c 1.6.x: 21f2d6452e
This bug is triggered when using a log file for the generator console messages (ie. when using the '-l' command line switch of the generator).
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
